newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Argentine Sept supermarket sales down to $734 mln.
newsitem.headline: Argentine Sept supermarket sales down to $734 mln.

text.p: Supermarket sales in Argentina dropped to $734.20 million in September from $804.13 million in August, the Economy Ministry said on Thursday.
The ministry said September's level was the lowest since it started keeping track of supermarket sales in May.
Sales per square meter dropped to $1,051 in September from $1,154 in August and were also the lowest since May.
The average sale in September was for $26.2, down from $27.3 in August.
